00041 public:
00044    CHoughSpace2D();

00061         CHoughSpace2D(ostream& os, int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight, int Thickness,

00221 
00225 
00226 inline float CHoughSpace2D::GetParameterRangeValue(int i, int j) const
00227 {
00228    CPoint2D<float> p;
00229    if (i==1) p = m_param1ValueRange;
00230    else p = m_param2ValueRange;
00231 
00232    if (j==1) return p.GetX();
00233    else return p.GetY();
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 inline int CHoughSpace2D::Discretize(int i, float v) const
00238 {
00239    if (i==1) return Round(m_offset.GetX()+v/m_stepValue.GetX()); 
00240    else      return Round(m_offset.GetY()-v/m_stepValue.GetY());
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00244 inline bool CHoughSpace2D::Inc(const CPoint2D<int>& Position)
00245 { 
00246    int x = Position.GetX();
00247    int y = Position.GetY();
00248    this->operator[](x)[y]++; 
00249 
00250    if (this->operator[](x)[y] == m_threshold) {
00251       m_peakCoord.SetX(x);
00252       m_peakCoord.SetY(y);
00253       return true;
00254    }
00255 
00256    return false;
00257 }
00258 
00259 } // end namespace ipl
